answers.answer: Could be that your low on sodium.  I love that stuff also, but then I get heart burn off and on
So its not a bad thing?

Too much salt can be bad for you or baby, but so can too little and like the other comment said you may be low on sodium to begin with. I wouldn't panic over it though. Just talk to your doctor about it at your next appointment. If it's something you constantly crave that may be a sign of something they can help you with.
They've told me too much salt, sodium , makes you get swollen
Drink lots of water ! And talk to your doctor (:
A lot of sodium can lead to high blood pressure .. But I'd just monitor blood pressure. (I've had preeclampsia twice and doc pit me on low sodium diet of less than 1,000 mg per day)

Yeah I'm going to say that's probably not the best thing to be snacking on as it can increase your blood pressure.  You should probably tell your doc so they can do blood work to make sure your not having any issues with sodium levels, thyroid,  or even iron

question: I am 22 weeks pregnant, and as odd as this may seem, i am addicted to what is called "Beer Salt" its lime flavored salt. I am addicted to eating it. Could this be harmful to my baby?
title: My Addiction
